sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The OpenSSH package contains ssh, sshd, ssh-agent, ssh-add, sftp, scp, ssh-keygen, sftp-server and ssh-keyscan.

sect3.title: sshd
sect3.para: The daemon that permits you to login.

sect3.title: ssh-agent
sect3.para: An authentication agent that can store private keys.

sect3.title: ssh-add
sect3.para: Tool which adds keys to the ssh-agent.

sect3.title: sftp
sect3.para: FTP-like program that works over SSH1 and SSH2 protocol.

sect3.title: scp
sect3.para: File copy program that acts like rcp.

sect3.title: ssh-keyscan
sect3.para: Utility for gathering public host keys from a number of hosts.
